insert into admin_daily_statistics (total_user_num, login_user_num, ad_upload_num, ad_edit_num, ad_delete_num, total_ad_num, tap_request_num, mark_request_num, unmark_request_num, search_request_num, `date`) values (#{totalUserNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginUserNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adUploadNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adEditNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adDeleteNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalAdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tapRequestNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{markRequestNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unmarkRequestNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{searchRequestNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update admin_daily_statistics set total_user_num = #{totalUserNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login_user_num = #{loginUserNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_upload_num = #{adUploadNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_edit_num = #{adEditNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ad_delete_num = #{adDeleteNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_ad_num = #{totalAdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tap_request_num = #{tapRequestNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mark_request_num = #{markRequestNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unmark_request_num = #{unmarkRequestNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, search_request_num = #{searchRequestNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `date` = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, total_user_num, login_user_num, ad_upload_num, ad_edit_num, ad_delete_num, total_ad_num, tap_request_num, mark_request_num, unmark_request_num, search_request_num, `date` from admin_daily_statistics where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, total_user_num, login_user_num, ad_upload_num, ad_edit_num, ad_delete_num, total_ad_num, tap_request_num, mark_request_num, unmark_request_num, search_request_num, `date` from admin_daily_statistics

select id, total_user_num, login_user_num, ad_upload_num, ad_edit_num, ad_delete_num, total_ad_num, tap_request_num, mark_request_num, unmark_request_num, search_request_num, `date` from admin_daily_statistics order by id desc limit 7
